criteria.Timing: I prefer to receive recommendations in the late morning, after I've had my coffee and am ready to start my day, so they don't interfere with my slow morning routine. criteria.Frequency: I prefer receiving recommendations once every 4 hours, in a way that avoids excessive interruptions and supports my focus on creative projects. Ideally, there should be a good balance between recommendation intervals and quiet periods, allowing me to immerse myself in my work without constant distractions.
criteria.Communication_&_Safety: I prefer recommendations to be communicated in a casual and thoughtful style that feels accessible and matches my communication preferences.
